name: Balloon Shooter (Jayey's Backup)
description:
Oh no! The nation of the balloons has taken over the void that has been unhabitated for over 10 years! Luckily, you have an super-powerful cannon able to destroy them all and make the void peaceful again!

Click the screen to shoot a pebble. The cannon points at your mouse, so no arrow keys and yada yada.

(WARNING: If you're easily frustrated, please go play something else lol)

Click here to play this game on Scratch!
